text: Space Master X-7 is a 1958 American science fiction movie directed by Edward Bernds and starring Bill Williams, Lyn Thomas, Robert Ellis, Paul Frees, Rhoda Williams, Moe Howard, Thomas Browne Henry. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Edward Bernds
title: Space Master X-7
